website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for dorm rooms, studio apartments, or any small space. It supports a 5-speaker setup along with 1 subwoofer, and it can even use those speakers to create a 3.2.1 Dolby Atmos environment.
pros: Includes built-in apps so you can get started streaming from Pandora or TIDAL right away
Works with 4K TVs and can even handle Dolby Vision content
cons: The included 5.1 system is good, but a 7.1 or higher system would sound much better
It’s got 165W of power, which may not be enough for moderately sized rooms

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for your dollar
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a 15 year old receiver, and didn't want to spend a lot of money on the next receiver. This was a great win. I really wanted only a 5.1 system for the speaker set that I have in my small apartment, and the sound from this is lovely. I'm not an audiophile so this is great value for me. The only thing that I needed other than that, was banana plugs in the receiver. As for things I don't like. The menu system is pretty weak, and the pre-set HDMI buttons on the remote don't really make sense for a house with no cable and a lot of gaming/streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Downfall2448

customer_reviews.title: I gave it 5 stars not because it's the best receiver I've owned but because it exceeds All my ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars not because it's the best receiver I've owned but because it exceeds All my expectations for the price. I'm using 5 Bose acoustimass speakers plus a 10in Polk subwoofer and it sounds great. It has plenty of power and features for the price and I would definitely recommend this receiver to others.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Domning

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I set it up. It worked well for awhile, but then it just stopped recognizing ARC. So, I unplugged it to reset it and did the initial setup again. It worked well for another couple of weeks and then it stopped recognizing ARC again. I tried a bunch of different things and I could not get it to work again. I was going to try resetting it again, but if I have to do that every two weeks, then it’s not worth keeping. So, I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: SBDimovski

customer_reviews.title: Piece of cake to set up, beautiful to look at, easy on the ears!
customer_reviews.text: My first AV receiver in nearly 10 years was a cinch to set up, the MCACC room configuration and on screen prompts made the entire process a breeze. I don't have a 4K TV yet, but I feel safe knowing that once I get one, it's already compatible with 4K upscaling and HDR/Dolby Vision passthrough. I'm only a minor audiophile, but it sounds like music to my ears (pun sort of intended) when paired with some Polk Audio RM6751s. Amazon delivery was painless... There was minor damage in a corner of the box but it was superficial. Everything is great with this package. Can't beat that price either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cybulska

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace an earlier Pioneer AVR that was not up to HDCP 2.2. This one is an improvement, especially the onscreen user interface. The previous one was primitive. The sound produced is high quality and video transmission is very good. My major complaint about this, and any Pioneer product, is the customer support. It is pathetic. They don't respond to emails and their tech people have little expertise. This is a very weak link in their product. Otherwise, I would give this product another star.
customer_reviews.author: Friendlyphil

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Demon...  wait, did I say Demon or Denon?
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sounding stereo and It’s very affordable to boot! I replaced a Denon a/v receiver with this unit to run my Advent speakers and Polk sub. The sound is amazing and the setup was pretty straight forward. Compared to the Denon’s nightmare of menus and sub menus and sub-sub menus, the interface with this Pioneer was pretty seamless. Even if the price was higher, I would still rate this as a really nice stereo, I guess the affordability is just a bonus! Get it, you’ll enjoy it...
customer_reviews.author: John A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the with this receiver!  A good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this receiver after a month of use. Easy to setup with on-screen guidance! Works well with my speakers and powered sub-woofer. No issues with setting it up to my network router. Bluetooth connectivity to my iphone & ipad and other devices works very good. No issues with connectivity to my wireless network hard drive, which has many videos and music on it. The price of $299 was a bargain IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Tony-South Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great little receiver/amp. No real control of the speakers or the sub-woofer volume, as this is auto adjusted by the unit. No input is supplied for over the air free digital TV like whats supplied on the back of all flat screens that have TV cable input. This system has a hdmi cable/sat input, however no amplified antennas have hdmi on the plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I’m into it ... but I shoulda
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s prolly fantastic ... but I took a star off because of how it suits MY needs ... I should have thought about before purchasing. I looked at all it had and could do and was like I want that. The reality is I stream all my content which doesn’t allow me to use all the Dolby, DTS, etc that this unit offers. Probably would have been good with the 532 and saved a little coin. But ... love Pioneer!
customer_reviews.author: A. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Solid Unit For a nice price
customer_reviews.text: The receiver I had worked well but could not pass a 4K signal to my 4k Sony TV. I upgraded primarily to get this feature and it worked perfectly. Now that I also have the new Apple 4k TV streaming device, I found that most of the new Apple programs are in 4k. So, it all worked out well. The receiver has almost every current feature and operates virtually the same as any other in this price range. It is a value buy.
customer_reviews.author: jerryvp

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth stopped working a week after setting up the receiver, disappointing. Update, rebooting will bring back Bluetooth, but will fail again. Streaming music is the primary use for this receiver, should’ve returned it first time Bluetooth failed. Subtracted a star from previous review.
customer_reviews.author: John Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used this AV receiver in my living room 5.1 surround setup. I like the EQ adjustments that you can make however it is a very time consuming experience to tweak the EQ to your liking. I would have preferred that Pioneer had provided a set of pre amp outputs and amp inputs so I could insert my own external equalizer. The sound is quite good, better than my older Pioneer QSX 520 receiver. Like the CEC feature, when I turn off the TV the Pioneer goes off too.
customer_reviews.author: clif

customer_reviews.title: relay clicking sound/ Audio and video cutting out
customer_reviews.text: Connected to windows 10 pc with GTX 1080 ti, xbox one x, tivo mini, and sony x900e. When sound is muted on pc, receiver makes clicking sound. Also audio/video will cut out for half a second randomly when watching video or listening to music. This second issue only pops up at 4k 60hz. Lowering resolution or frame rate to 30 hz eliminates the problem, indicating some kind of interference/bandwidth issue, which persists across mulitple HDMI 2.0 cables. Audio quality is good tho
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great receiver. Use the auto EQ and match your room acoustics perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Regular0ldguy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and configure.
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed and configured. Sound is decent, power rating is perhaps a little optimistic. But for my application it worked really well. Simple to use and setup. Great for SMALL room area. Not overly dynamic sound. So don't expect Elite level functionality with this bargain unit. Bluetooth is a breeze to setup and use. I say go for it if you are on the fence. Lastly- Box arrived severely damaged, however unit inside was pristine. I question if Amazon delivery gives a ....!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fasheh

customer_reviews.title: Serious new distortion of all bass
customer_reviews.text: I love Pioneer products, but not anymore. This receiver lasted 1 year to the day, the bass is now completely disappeared. I thought maybe speakers had gone bad (klipsh) so I replaced them with Boston acoustics, same thing- it’s the receiver. I use it for television, gunshots sound like pings, bass is distorted, total piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: s33flyer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant because these things can be difficult to set up and get the proper sound. The full auto function is AMAZING! It automatically adjusts each individual speaker volume based how your room is set up. The best part is you just press a button and the receiver does the rest. I am beyond happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: roach1upkennels

customer_reviews.title: Great digital audio, good sound
customer_reviews.text: It's a great modern reciever. Plays digital audio from my roku without issue. The only reason for 4 stars is the bass, nothing has ever had nead as much bass as my old Pioneer stereo reciever. I guess it's just modem reciever won't power front side channel woofers well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: An overall best value.
customer_reviews.text: Well it maybe won't be enough for a full Atmos surround system but you can get for very few dollars a great HT, sound is good, functionality is easy at fron panel, remote control or app; access to web based services is very nice. For me is the best value nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Chromecast implementation very buggy
customer_reviews.text: This receiver isn't terrible but the Chromecast feature is infuriating. Takes a long time to connect and won't hold a connection without dropouts etc. Other equipment had no problem with the same signal on the same network. The feature was included with a firmware update which shuffled around some of the Dolby stuff - they likely got it barely working and called it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Karlos

customer_reviews.title: A WONDERFUL replacement for an older Pioneer
customer_reviews.text: What a great receiver! So easy to install! And OMG what a superior change from the old 2006 model! Now all new up to date tech systems can talk to each other correctly! From SAT to receiver and TV! Wow!! So good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PMP

customer_reviews.title: LIKE NEW
customer_reviews.text: FACTORY PACKAGING HAD BEEN OPENED AT SOME POINT BUT NOT A SCRATCH OR EVEN A FINGER PRINT WAS ON THE UNIT. UNFORTUNATELY THE 4K TV I BOUGHT TO GO WITH THIS RECEIVER WAS DEAD ON ARRIVAL. SO I CAN'T VOUCH FOR IT'S OPERATION UNTIL I GET A NEW TV.
customer_reviews.author: kevin charles

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this is that it doesn't have a sleep off feature... Sometimes I shut the TV off which automatically shuts the cable off... My old one would shut off after 20 minutes of no use , this one will stay on all night. Works great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Dane Chase

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the sound is awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s pioneer. Sound is great but their was no instruction book on how to use it or set it up. Had to spend some time searching on line for guidance which was a pain in the rear
customer_reviews.author: Terry Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver and great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with this receiver so far. Setup was extremely easy. The HDMI ports work well, and I've had no issues with 4K video. My favorite feature so far is the Airplay functionality - love being able to listen to all the music on my phone on a decent setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Clear Sound
customer_reviews.text: So smart even coordinates with my TV thru HDMI to adjust volume thru TV volume control. I love the Great Sound too and adjusts EQ to your living space
customer_reviews.author: Emery Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Got first unit defective !Second unit great first unit did not even have on screen guide no wifi bluetooth sent backim 50 years old been buying pioneer my whlle life never had a issue until now amozon wasvery quick to help me sent me replacement in two days bought unit for hdmi capability worksgreat!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy hess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very intuitive controls. Sound just blows my old Yamaha away. Awesome amount for features for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Better than Denon
customer_reviews.text: It's a Pioneer,It's great, no need to say any thing else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, Great effects
customer_reviews.text: Product came as expected worked perfectly and and sounded terrific, now when my neighbors blast their video game, I easily drowned them out with some metal that I like and they hate, it awesome
customer_reviews.author: D. Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my camp. Nice sound and plenty of power. Able to connect to Pandora and Spotify.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good economical AV receiver
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older Denon. To say this is more user friendly would be a vast understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Warren A.

customer_reviews.title: The ability to go above and beyond what I would ever need in a entertainment reciever
customer_reviews.text: Awesomeness ensues!! For an entry level unit it packs a Tyson punch and a full suite of high performing features.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very much liked the ease to set up and so very easy to use and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system to replace my old Pioneer system. I love it! Great sound. Plenty of digital outputs to hook up as many components as you want. Would definitely purchase again and recommend do anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kip H.

customer_reviews.title: Just bought second one, great value
customer_reviews.text: Has all HDMI ports and 4k pass through needed, works great, setup comprehensive and easy
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the price, pushes out alot if bass and is great for movies or everyday TV, will definitely improve your audio quality!
customer_reviews.author: Armando Caceres

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds as expected. ATMOS 2.1.2 with floor standing fronts sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ARC
customer_reviews.text: WHEN YOU USE THR ARC CONNECTION IT UPSCALE 1080 PICTURE TO NEAR 4K, YOU CAN REALLY SEE THE DIFFERENCE
customer_reviews.author: vernell richmond

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I am getting trouble because, power supply 120v I need 220v
customer_reviews.author: krishantha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, superior sound, easy HDMI hook up, and full function remot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TV Pass Through Problems
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and looks great. The one problem I have with this receiver is the pass through for my cable TV. It sometimes blacks my picture out (losses the TV signal) when the receiver is not on when watching cable TV. Have to reset the receiver, other then that I like the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Update: 1st one was DOA out of box. 2nd one is working great!
customer_reviews.text: 11/4/17 Update: Second receiver is working great! No issues out of the box and setup was extremely easy. Original review: I'll update this review when I receive a working receiver. So excited to set this up and first powering on it immediately says "THERMAL ERROR" and shuts off. I'm giving them the benefit of the doubt and hoping it's a rare lemon. I'll revise my review if the second one actually works.
customer_reviews.author: biqa

customer_reviews.title: Support is horrible. I never leave reviews
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of junk that never works properly. Support is horrible. I never leave reviews, Pioneer is the worst. Unit doesn't pass 4k well at all, freaks out and then stops working forever.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great sound, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great value. All the newest features, sounds great, easy to setup and it has the microphone for surround sound configuration. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: S W

customer_reviews.title: This limitation should be better explained.
customer_reviews.text: It claimed to support google cast, but it only supports audio. When I go to cast Netflix it get an screen that says chromecast with a progress bar and only hear the show. This limitation should be better explained.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Firmware update was easy. I'm absolutely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It had fullfiled my expectations. I didn't found any problem, Firmware update was easy. I'm absolutely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Value packed with the right bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value with 4K up conversion. 5.1 output with Automatic speaker balancing using provided microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great unit. Actually more than I need
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Actually more than I need. Great shipping and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My Polks sound great with this amp
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My Polks sound great with this amp, All the features work great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J.

customer_reviews.title: Dropped dead
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months on this item. just dropped dead. still has power & lights. No output. chaos in trying to enforce warranty, in the meantime......... outta' luck or buy a Marantz.
customer_reviews.author: steve boyer

customer_reviews.title: how to do an  update for the first  time !!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: update..... hooked it to internet today for its update out of the box followed how to do it works great when you do this you wait while its updateing /installing and when it says complete it takes a while let it go by itself after a while it will shut off by itself then you manually power on the pioneer works great this a great receiver for those that want the latest bells and whistles at a steal price this is a great receiver for the money if you want the newest technogy this is it for cheaper price !!!!!!!!!!!! 7/8/2017
customer_reviews.author: MOVIE MAN BAKER

customer_reviews.title: Chromecast built-in feature is very buggy
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the price, the main reason I purchased this receiver was for the Chromecast built-in functionality. Unfortunately, the Chromecast implementation on this device is so buggy as to be unusable. Cast enabled apps are able to see the receiver; however, they generally fail to connect. On the rare occasion that apps successfully connect to the receiver, the audio is choppy and the controls are laggy. This seems to be specific to this Pioneer receiver, as I have no trouble using Chromecast with a Google Home located in the same room as this unit or with other streaming devices in my house. Very disappointed with this product and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WCKORY

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a remote in my package. Very disappointed. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my system in my bedroom. Replaced an old Sherwood.
customer_reviews.author: H. Moore

product_meta.title: Pioneer Dolby Atmos-Ready Audio & Video Component Receiver Black (VSX-832)
product_meta.description: Pioneer Dolby Atmos-Ready Audio & Video Component Receiver Black (VSX-832)
feature_bullets: 5.1 Ch. AVR capable of immersive DTS:X and Dolby Atmos 3.1.2 and 2.1.2 speaker setups for 360 degree surround sound without rear/surround speakers (Atmos requires future firmware update)
Ultra HD pass-through with HDCP 2.2 (4K/60p/4:4:4) including HDR 10, BT.2020 and Dolby Vision compatible signal pass-through support
Drive your speakers with 165 W/Ch. (6 ohms, 1 kHz, THD 10 %, 1Ch Driven); 80 W/Ch. (8 ohms, 20 Hz-20 kHz, THD 0.08 %, 2Ch Driven FTC)
Chromecast built-in, DTS Play-Fi and Fire Connect offer amazing multi-room wireless audio options along with streaming services from Pandora, Tidal, Tune IN and Deezer (require firmware updates)
MCACC Auto Room Tuning, Reflex Optimizer and Phase Control combine to provide accurate sound imaging and the ideal reproduction environment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
